bug.author: apc999
bug.summary: Metrics "Under Filesystem Read" does not update
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: v2.0.0 Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. To Reproduce $ bin/alluxio-start.sh local -f $ bin/alluxio fsadmin report metrics Total IO: Short-circuit Read 0B Short-circuit Read (Domain Socket) 0B From Remote Instances 0B Under Filesystem Read 0B Alluxio Write 0B Alluxio Write (Domain Socket) 0B Under Filesystem Write 0B
Total IO Throughput (Last Minute): Short-circuit Read 0B Short-circuit Read (Domain Socket) 0B From Remote Instances 0B Under Filesystem Read 0B Alluxio Write 0B Alluxio Write (Domain Socket) 0B Under Filesystem Write 0B
$ bin/alluxio fs cat /sample_tweets_1m.csv > /dev/null
$ bin/alluxio fsadmin report metrics Total IO: Short-circuit Read 0B Short-circuit Read (Domain Socket) 0B From Remote Instances 0B Under Filesystem Read 0B Alluxio Write 0B Alluxio Write (Domain Socket) 0B Under Filesystem Write 0B
Total IO Throughput (Last Minute): Short-circuit Read 0B Short-circuit Read (Domain Socket) 0B From Remote Instances 0B Under Filesystem Read 171.72KB Alluxio Write 0B Alluxio Write (Domain Socket) 0B Under Filesystem Write 0B Expected behavior The total IO of Under Filesystem Read is never incremeted Urgency Median Additional context Similar issue: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/issues/9354>#9354</denchmark-link>
